title: Will i get a veteran emote thing??

replies.body:
I don't have a lot of info on Veteran Rewards just yet, but I have a feeling it would be more games played based than time.  We'll have to wait until we get more info about this to really know for sure, so bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for now.

We have an article up about 2017[ ranked rewards eligibility](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility), and currently bans from 8/22/19 are ineligible.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RscW2gxj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-26T16:17:00.925+0000)
>
> I don't have a lot of info on Veteran Rewards just yet, but I have a feeling it would be more games played based than time.  We'll have to wait until we get more info about this to really know for sure, so bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for now.
> 
> We have an article up about 2017[ ranked rewards eligibility](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility), and currently bans from 8/22/19 are ineligible.

Do you think this account has enough? I saw someone say somewhere that its 2.5k hours for the max one and i know ive gone way beyond that
